item.title: ‘Black Rabbit’ Review: Jude Law and Jason Bateman Lead Netflix’s Blandly Bleak Antihero Drama
item.description: Mix ‘The Bear,’ ‘Uncut Gems’ and a lot of ‘Ozark’ and you get this eight-part limited series about two bumbling brothers trying to set things right in Brooklyn.

item.title: Jason Bateman and Jude Law Run From Loan Sharks in High-Octane ‘Black Rabbit’ Trailer
item.description: The Netflix limited series sees the actors and executive producers playing very different yet both dysfunctional brothers in New York City.

item.title: Jason Bateman, Jude Law, Toni Collette, Ethan Hawke TV Series Join Toronto Fest Lineup
item.description: The Primetime program will premiere shows before they reach TV screens, also from Richard Brown, Sterlin Harjo, Mae Martin, Zach Baylin and Kate Susman and Houman Seyyedi.
